page.title: 15TRADE (FROYLE/HOLYBOURNE)
page.content: There are {village shops} in Holybourne, Upper Froyle and Lower Froyle. Although Altn is only 3 miles away from Froyle and almost next door to Holybourne, people find it very convenient to buy extra things from the village shop even if they go to the supermarket for their weekly 'shop'. The village shops sell a variety of things like groceries, fruit and vegetables, medicines (non-prescription), toys and sometimes wines and spirits too. They also all have a {Post Office {counter}where people can buy stamps. send telegrams, cash pensions etc. without a special journey into Alton. In Holybourne the {market garden} sells vegetables, fruit, flowers and plants and in the summer there is a 'pick your own' scheme.
